item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

I added this to my class8:

if(i == 1123){ //~Poison Platebody~ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; //Purple: 926-127 class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 127; class8.anInt174 = 2438;//Item Look class8.anInt181 = 900; class8.anInt190 = 400; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 3188; class8.anInt200 = 255; class8.anInt175 = 255; class8.anInt197 = 100; class8.aString170 = "Poison Platebody"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A venomous platebody.".getBytes(); }
Now i have no idea how to create models, I just wanted a adamant platebody, but purple, but instead I get a little picture of a white bone mask thing.
